snippet: For the second time in a year, Dr. Kent D. Shinbach took the witness stand at the retrial of David Tarloff to describe the nightmarish attack on him.
abstract: Dr Kent D Shinbach takes witness stand to describe his nightmarish attack at retrial of David Tarloff; minutes before Tarloff attacked Shinbach in 2008, he had killed Kathryn Faughey, psychologist who shared an office with him at 435 East 79th Street; Tarloff’s lawyers do not contest that he slashed and stabbed Faughey to death but argue he is not responsible because of mental illness.
lead_paragraph: For the second time in a year, Dr. Kent D. Shinbach took the witness stand at the retrial of David Tarloff to describe the nightmarish attack on him.

headline.main: At Retrial, Therapist Retraces Grisly Scene
headline.print_headline: At Retrial, Therapist Retraces Grisly Scene
